registerTaskNamePlaceholder: Enter a habit you wanna build
selectLanguageDescription: We are working on adding more languages
selectLanguageDescription2: If you want to help us, please contact us
aboutusDescription: A 30-day challenge is a great way to jumpstart a new habit or practice.
aboutusDescription2: Its also a great way to get out of a rut. You can do anything for 30 days.
onboardingRule1Des: Start your habit-building journey by scanning the QR code daily. Make it a simple, consistent ritual to mark your attendance.
onboardingRule2Des: Consistency is the key. Commit to daily QR scans, and witness gradual progress. Your dedication shapes a disciplined and organized life.
onboardingRule3Des: Building discipline means conquering inner battles. Push through low motivation, celebrate small wins, and triumph over resistance with each successful scan.
